attributes.action: Restrict the number of times a candidate can stand for election to parliament, to three terms, as a member of parliament, a member of parliament who was made Prime Minister may stand for one additional term.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These new regulations would make for a more democratic government. There would be less career politicians, less dead wood, more people with new ideas,and would give more people the opportunity of taking part in government. More independently thinking people, and less members becoming yes men to party dogma.
British Government would then be run in the interest of the people, rather than for the benefit of the establishment.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
